com.nfcalarmclock

Class NacCalendar

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nfcalarmclock.system.NacCalendar

  • public class NacCalendar
extends java.lang.Object
    A list of possible days the alarm can run on. TODO Fix getNextMessage and getMessage so that they're language compliant.
